Package tr.com.turkcell.turkcellid

Turkcell ID SDK provides an authentication mechanism for Android applications.

    TurkcellIdManager
    This class provides an authentication mechanism.

Package tr.com.turkcell.turkcellid Description

Turkcell ID SDK provides an authentication mechanism for Android applications.

Authentication

In order to authenticate users:
  • Create an new instance of TurkcellIdManager and pass your activity reference and your unique application id
  • Call showLoginDialog() method with a TurkcellIdManager.TurkcellIdListener and true parameters in order to display full-screen login dialog.
  • onTurkcellIdAuthorized(String) method is called after successful login. Use authToken parameter to access any protected resource on compatible server.
Usage: 
package com.example.app;

 import tr.com.turkcell.turkcellid.TurkcellIdManager;
 import android.app.Activity;
 import android.os.Bundle;
 import android.widget.Toast;


 public class ExampleActivity extends Activity implements TurkcellIdManager.TurkcellIdListener {

        private TurkcellIdManager turkcellIdManager;

        @Override
        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
                super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
                turkcellIdManager = new TurkcellIdManager(this, YOUR_APPLICATION_ID);
                turkcellIdManager.showLoginDialog(this, true);
        }

        @Override
        public void onTurkcellIdAuthorized(String authToken) {
                Toast.makeText(this, "Authorized successfully, authToken: " + authToken, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
        }

        @Override
        public void onTurkcellIdDialogDismissed() {
                Toast.makeText(this, "dialog closed", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
        }

 }
